product_name: Haiku Grab Bag II - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soft yet durable, this versatile bag with many pockets is well-suited for your everyday playful endeavors. Wear it short over your shoulder, slung long on your hip or strapless inside a larger bag.
short_description: Soft yet durable, this versatile bag with many pockets is well-suited for your everyday playful endeavors. Wear it short over your shoulder, slung long on your hip or strapless inside a larger bag.
